review: good tower defence game

classic tower defense game with a decent economy you are not held to one path when trying to get your towers or spells upgraded it has a feel of a microtransaction game without having to actually spend cash on it well worth the time spent
just a great tower defense game very straight forward and cut and dry the way it should be

at times frustrating and needlessly esoteric this is nevertheless a solid tower defense game with a cardcollecting mechanic that tends to be a bit too random to be 100 useful depending on your luck with drops you may have to spend extra time grinding some levels to advance huge hint lightning is op  but is also one of the most expensive towers in the game

it is a cellphone game converted to pc it has that tedious grinding to get cards and in game currency its all free now but the grind the grind is boring  i woud recommend it just because it is a td and i like those games but it does not have nothing special on it all the lore is not interesting and cliche it has a poor interface and theres not enought explanation about the towers and how they work porperly
good game
by far my favourite tower defence game always come back to it for a dose of satisfying goodness hope they implement an offline mode as i am worried of a server only game
very good
no i dont recommend the game

trash game trash devs  do not buy   they ported a mobile game to try and get pay to win mechanics converted to a grindfest for players  uninspired towers badly modelled enemies  the game is essentially unplayable if you have played any other td game
not bad but i dont love it
good game fun for when travelling with a laptop that does not have the best graphics card  i use this on an old surface pro2 touchsreen and it works great
a mobile free to play title that was ported to pc not enough was done to rebalance the game around no longer being a free to play title so it rapidly turns into an utter chore

its an okay tower defense game but because its a mobile port its gonna have grinding endgame which originally was meant to be a paywall since they removed the premium shop it just looks like a game that has a paywall but no premium shop because its cheap and you can complete the main campaign without the grind i will give thumbs up but just so you know better alternatives exist like dungeon defenders 1 and kingdom rush
its a lazy mobile port poor ui average gameplay its ok but nothing to recommend
besides the game age and grindiness the achievements dont trigger properly like half of them
simple yet lofty tower defense game tons of unique ways to upgrade towers instead of the usual one path one click tier system

i love tower defense games this one would be ok if it didnt have such a terrible upgrade system   originally it was a pay to win or obscene levels of grinding type of game before it became a steam game once it became a steam game the pay to win went away which just leaves you with mindnumbing grinding and depending on rng for decent upgrades   this game isnt worth it even if it was free
its a mobile game or if not it definitely feels like one its grindy as hell and really repetitive

nice little tower defense game at first  it gets tougher as youd expect though  none of this  microtransaction bs to irritate you either  and it can be replayed at a higher difficulty as an easy option
best tower defence game that i know of and i have played most of them to death
good
the perfect tower defense game an exciting upgrade system definitely worth your money
funny tower based game with a lot good challenges
nice tower defense game  short
still cool

if you are in the mood for a colorful brightly animated tower defense game with some depth then this game will hit the spot  as you finish levels or check in for the day the game will reward you with cards that unlock towers or spells  the variety of towers spells and enemies allows for sustained novelty  the story is depicted in between levels as a well illustrated comic strip  if you are a tower defense player this should definitely be in your playlist
too much grinding required to beat the game
great strategy game

very well balanced tower defense game for me it is one of the most interesting td game i have come across towers are well designed with several levels and types of damage the story is also not so bad for td game after completing main story there is harder difficulty which extends the play time and test your skill in this game  overall i happily recommend this for every tower defense games player this game may be old but it is pleasure to play even in the year of 2021

top notch tower defense game  great graphics and the balance is excellent because when you are a little stuck on a level you have a natural mechanic to grind a bit and gain strength so you can move beyond that tough level  one of the best examples of the genre ive ever seen
its an amazing tower defense game with some rpg elements
good game bit slow getting materials but apart from that good fun
winning is 80 grind 20 tactics level 1 towers are useless lvl 25 lightning tower works for almost everything
good turret defense game but it is a little old though hard to start out but is better once you have invested some time into it
a decent tower defense game with some card features
very good tower defence game difficulty builds nicely as you progress

i was quite enjoying this game then i started it up and found all my progress had been completely erased it seems the game doesnt use a local save and doesnt allow for backup saves even worse i found that this problem has been happening for like 6 years theres no point in playing this game if something like this can happen  dont risk it just avoid
way too much grinding required
nice game to kill some time if you dont have that much time  the levels are fun sometimes frustrating but still a nice game to play d i will recommend it thats for sure
fun
very challenging you have to use the right combinations of towers and upgrade upgrade upgrade
bloody marvellous

after my initial complaint the developer was very quick to respond and they must have patched it straight away because the game runs smoothly now its a fun tower defense game that looks very good the card collecting and forging doesnt really add anything imo but it doesnt do any harm either so im content
yup
fun meter  710
this is what you can consider a bad tower defense not only are most maps extremely boring to play it also has the audacity to waste your time with its progression

game is fun for 5 but i cannot give this a positive review the developers have decided to go full pay to win for the sequel and try to justify the 20 per month subscription by adding even more premium bonuses thus making it even more pay to win i do not support greedy developers so unless you can get this game for under 5 or elsewhere for free then avoid it and do not give them your money this was my first negative review actually but disgusting developers deserve it
excellent tower defense game
ewrrt bwtw
cool and cheap game its a lot of fun for many hours no microtransactions so thats makes it even better
played this game for years before i started playing it on steam really great td game
a good tower defence
poorly managed bad grinding

this game is fun but beware it is chocked full of microtransactions if you want to be on top you will have to fork out serious cash additionally when they run events be sure to spend your event currency before the event ends unlike other similar games on the market they do not give you a courtesy 24 hours to spend your earnings just lost 200k alien cash because i was not aware of this flaw
with a long campaign randomly generated side missions and many cards to collect prime world defenders offers fans of the tower defence genre a lasting and varied challenge

great game but ruined by technical issue constantly freeze while playing i tried every solution i found like excluded game folder from windows sercutiry block the game from internet connection via windows firewall but nothing work it keep freezing and it pi me off strangely i used to pirated this game before but it run smoothly like a charm

decent balance between grinding for itemslevels and fun gameplay cutscenes are badly broken on my 4k display so im not really sure whats going on with the story but the tower defense part works well enough does not seem to have learned much from other games in the genre though you cant tell how many mobs are left in a wave and how long before the next one so its too easy to accidentally summon a wave right as a new one starts

tags tower defense additional tags delete local content  remove from library  tldr decent looking at first until you realize this uses randomized rewards for beating levels play the free to play defenders 2 instead if you are still interested in such a mechanic

h1pretty good unfortunately theres too much grindh1  solid td nice graphics a history if you care classic towers types spread into cards and an upgrade   forge system however like the title says youll need a lot of grind here by the first boss it will be necessary and i can bet it will get worse the good news are theres a mobile version so im going to invest my time there in a more casual way you know waiting for the doctor in the airplane long buses trips
one of the best td game  it have a scenario a story
severely underrated

this is a grind in the shape of a tower defense an rngfueled grind all the stink of a mobile game is upon it both its mechanics and its interface and its boring and easy the story is both meaningless and unintelligible  give it a hard pass

this game is worth every cent if i can get 40 hours out of a 10 game wow the maps have good varieties as do the enemies and bosses i like the tower system and the progression between towers the only downside is how it feels a little like a mobile game but that is purely subjective i wish nival would have kept with this format for pwd2
ive played a lot of tower defense games in my time and i have to say this is my favorite by far  i can see myself spending a lot of hours in this one
httpsyoutubeczaqcfm9uga  many of the progression hooks are based heavily over a slow currency grind and randomized upgrades that slows the pacing enough to drag player engagement

nicely made game nice story achievements give you something that is rare there is grinding but not much unless you count all achievements even for some achievements too much minus special upgrades are quickly upgraded and they are few and some towers are too rare there is also a cloud saver preferably with a discount too bad they didnt make a 2nd game like the first one

fun little tower defense game seems like a tablet or mobile port although it was fun for a while the need for grinding becomes apparant in the later game  the maps are also designated paths with build location set by the game  i much prefer tower defense games that allow you to construct your own maze rather than having enemies follow a predefined route it allows for more strategy to be employed by the player  however i enjoyed this game non the less and totally got my money from it
too grindy spend hours getting to a point and cant progress because you havent gotten the right cards then you need to grind for hours hoping you actually get the right cards to drop very annoying

i cant recommend this because as of their last patch years ago there were some bugs that i consider major if they werent there i wouldnt hesitate to recommend this game their last patch broke some of the mechanics of the game making it very difficult to finish
love this tower defense game i find it very relaxing and the graphics are great for its style of game

brilliant tower defence game with challenging aspects and not an easy win everytime for sure worth the money and would reccommend highly to anyone who also is looking for tower defence games all the time ignore the metacritic score if thats what sways you as its a very decent game

amazing td game good price lots of play time realistic graphics its never the same due to the card distribution system hands down the best td game on steam if youre looking for a fun challenging td game this is it look at the hrs ive spent on it you know this is a serious review also no bs dlc stuff you get the whole game for a small price
fun game
great game if u like tds you have to play this one
it doesnt matter that the game is good  bthe devs completely abandoned itb you will have problems with bsteam cloudb and achievments completion
this is most likely one of the best tower defense games i ever played

the only tower defense game that i played that had a storysure it was not that great but it had something to further increase the enjoyment and involvement of the player to keep me entertained  graphics and gameplay though being ports are still good enough for pc

sleek tower defense nice enemies nice animations topnotch graphics somewhat grindy as this is a classical timewaster for portable devices but thoroughly enjoyable you collect cards the represent your towers you may improve each tower through fusion or evolution of several same or different cards a sufficient number or cards varies the game evolving cards allows to change your strategy when you repeat the same map to earn more cards highly recommended

this is a fantastic game and highly underrated i paid like 1 for this and i feel bad now because its easily worth the 10 at full price its a great tower defense game with a card gamespell crafting system to upgrade both towers and spells as well as a kind of skill tree to unlock more tower slots and other things it has some other unique elements ive never seen anywhere else like being able to get more tower currency for starting npc waves early overall its a great package

i was having an okay time playing this game until i spent my hard earned stars on a unique pack of cards only to be forced to sell them due to no inventory space how about let the user have the choice to sell other cards in their collection first terrible user experience i doubt the devs read these reviews but thanks for wasting my time  i can only recommend this game if you really like tower defense games its very grindy be careful when buying packs of cards

an odd mix of card collection and tower defense that surprisingly works really well together this is a short review read another for a more indepth look i love td games and this one is really fun plain and simple
this is the 2nd most fun tdg i have played next to deathtrap worth ther buy if you like tdg

grind grind grind while a lot of tds with rpgish elements can suffer from the problem of  are my strategytactics wrong or do i need to just level up this one suffers from that more than most  and the grind only makes that worse   i could recommend this if it werent for those two problems
a nice tower defence game but with limit endless mode
out of the general tds out there this is decent and does the basics very well a little grindy as it appears to be a mobile port but i found it enjoyable
its nice
great game if you dont have a lot of time to waste

an excellent tower defense game focusing on bringing the right combination of towers and spells to any given engagement level variety is great it can get very grindy at times though as you have to get a lot of cards to have the raw numbers to beat some levels

its a good enough td even a bit better than good enough since it has a not bad progression system hehe but the game right now is reeeally cheap so if youre going to get it on the discounted price i mostly sure recommend it

fun immersive and an awful lot of choices in customizing your towers tcg and td combined well it is a bit of a grinding game but i have never minded that style of game

zero developer support over longstanding bugs and too many small issues that plague the game compared to other tower defense games on the market i wanted to like this so badly as its got great graphics and i really like the talents and cards mechanics but sadly the actual gameplay isnt as good as can be found in other games of this type

edit the problem has been fixed its a great game again  buy the game only if you want to support developers who dont care at all about their customers theyve stopped supporting the game and the servers were shut down as a consequence the achievements wont work anymore and your progress will only be saved locally such a shame for a game that had some great content

game for smartphone not for pc it does not seem right to drag and drop all the time plus the game is super slow on my computer on which i can play any of the latest fps a poor port to pc

on first glance this is a pretty td game but it is heavily aimed towards mobile platforms the levels require an unhealthy amount of grinding to make any progress achievements and rankings are not available because the game servers to which the achievements are tied are shut down the game lags and stutters even with a decent gaming rig while pretty at first look it gets repetitive very fast the few random sound effects sound like a joke after the first hours go buy defense grid instead

if you seriously love td games then get this while its on sale but even then i wouldnt recommend it extremely unresponsive mouse controls and lags or freezes every few seconds when there is a lot going on for a td it had some innovative ideas but the controls and bugs make it unplayable completely

prime world defenders was my first experience of a tower defense game on pc the game will have you grind and grind to improve your towers yet this game has alot of charm i spent alot of time playing and kept coming back for more love the art style and tower cards defenders got me hooked on tower defense games the holiday sale is almost upon us buy it on sale if your new to tower defense games give it a try

its too bad the devs just let this game rot i dont really understand how they can still sell something that only half works its a decent tower defense game but since they apparently dont support it anymore i wont be recommending this
got it for free quite funny for a short time tower defense never gets old
